navigation_document_supertype.description: Document type grouping powering the new taxonomy-based navigation pages

phase.description: The service design phase of this content item - https://www.gov.uk/service-manual/phases

search_user_need_document_supertype.description: Document supertype grouping core and government documents

user_journey_document_supertype.description: Document type grouping powering analytics of user journeys

absolute_path.description: A path only. Query string and/or fragment are not allowed.

analytics_identifier.description: A short identifier we send to Google Analytics for multi-valued fields. This means we avoid the truncated values we would get if we sent the path or slug of eg organisations.

body.description: The main content provided as HTML rendered from govspeak

change_note.description: Change note for the most recent update

acronym.description: The organisation's acronym, if it has one.

alternative_format_contact_email.description: The organisation's email for requesting an alternative format for attachments

brand.description: The organisation's brand class name, which is mapped to a colour in the frontend.

foi_exempt.description: Whether the organisation is exempt from Freedom of Information requests.

important_board_members.description: The number of board members that will have photos displayed for them.

logo.description: The organisation's logo, including the logo image and formatted name.

ordered_corporate_information_pages.description: A set of links to corporate information pages to display for the organisation.

ordered_promotional_features.description: A set of promotional features to display for the organisation. Turn into proper links once organisations are fully migrated.

organisation_featuring_priority.description: Whether to prioritise news or services on the organisation's home page.

organisation_govuk_status.description: The status of the organisation on GOV.UK.

organisation_political.description: Determines whether content published by this organisation represents governments policies and can be eligible for history mode

secondary_corporate_information_pages.description: A string containing sentences and links to corporate information pages that are not included in ordered_corporate_information_pages.

social_media_links.description: A set of links to social media profiles for the object.

first_published_at.description: The date the content was first published.  Automatically determined by the publishing-api, unless overridden by the publishing application.

api_url.description: DEPRECATED: api_path should be used instead of api_url. This is due to values of api_url being tied to an environment which can cause problems when data is synced between environments. In time this field will be removed by the Publishing Platform team.

web_url.description: DEPRECATED: base_path should be used instead of web_url. This is due to values of web_url being tied to an environment which can cause problems when data is synced between environments. In time this field will be removed by the Publishing Platform team.

api_url.description: DEPRECATED: api_path should be used instead of api_url. This is due to values of api_url being tied to an environment which can cause problems when data is synced between environments. In time this field will be removed by the Publishing Platform team.

web_url.description: DEPRECATED: base_path should be used instead of web_url. This is due to values of web_url being tied to an environment which can cause problems when data is synced between environments. In time this field will be removed by the Publishing Platform team.

high_resolution_url.description: URL to a high resolution version of the image, for use by third parties such as Twitter, Facebook or Slack. Used by the machine readable metadata component. Don't use this on user-facing web pages, as it might be very large.

url.description: URL to the image. The image should be in a suitable resolution for display on the page.

ordered_featured_documents.description: A set of featured documents to display.

ordered_featured_links.description: A set of featured links to display.

payload_version.description: Counter to indicate when the payload was generated

public_updated_at.description: When the content was last significantly changed (a major update). Shown to users.  Automatically determined by the publishing-api, unless overridden by the publishing application.

publishing_app_name.description: The application that published this item.

publishing_request_id.description: A unique identifier used to track publishing requests to rendered content

rendering_app.description: The application that renders this item.
